TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewVirtualItemsSelectionRangeChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 处于虚拟模式下时， 事件发生，并且更改项范围的选择状态。The event occurs when the is in virtual mode, and the selection state of a range of items is changed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `ListView1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. param.name: startIndex
param.span: 范围中更改了选择状态的第一项的索引。

span.span: The index of the first item in the range that has changed.

param.name: endIndex
param.span: 范围中更改了选择状态的最后一项的索引。

span.span: The index of the last item in the range that has changed.

param.name: isSelected
param.span: 如果为 ，则指示已选定范围中的项；如果为 ，则指示已取消选择范围中的项。

span.span: to indicate the items are selected; to indicate the items are deselected.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当项从选定项更改为取消选择并取消选中时，将发生 。The occurs when items are changed from selected to deselected, and deselected to selected. `isSelected` 参数指示项范围的当前状态。The `isSelected` parameter indicates the current state of the range of items.
